dungeonadventure.items

Class CDPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeonadventure.items.Item
      • dungeonadventure.items.CDPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Holdable, Hostable, Inspectable, Nameable, Openable, Playable, Powerable, java.io.Serializable

    public class CDPlayer
extends Item
implements Powerable, Openable, Hostable, Holdable, Playable
    A CD Player item. Takes a CD to play and can be powered ON/OFF.
    Author:
    Mikko Piuhola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
